duties_responsibilities.duty: Ensure a positive shopping experience for customers by greeting and assisting them in a courteous and friendly manner.
Maintain a clean and organized work area, and ensure proper merchandise presentation.
Assist customers with merchandise, answer their questions, and handle customer issues in a courteous and helpful way.
Perform cleaning tasks, replenish supplies, and disinfect high-touch areas to maintain a clean store environment.
Expedite newly received merchandise to the sales floor and maintain merchandise/brand name familiarity within departments.
Demonstrate integrity and honesty in all interactions with associates and customers, and follow all company policies and procedures.
Maximize productivity by executing all store best practices and minimizing steps and touches in work flow.
